enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before using the switchMapTransformer to ensure the map and transformers are properly initialized.
The transformers need to be initialized before they can be used in the switchMapTransformer.
This method can be used to verify the output of the transformer selected by switchMapTransformer, ensuring it matches expected results.
This method can compare the results of different transformers to ensure the correct one is selected by switchMapTransformer.
